lead_paragraph: In a newly released hour of commentary made in 2001 called “I Kinda Like It When a Lotta People Die,” the comedian delights in picturing the end of the world.

headline.print_headline: Once Too Raw, a Carlin Special Resurfaces
headline.main: A George Carlin Special Too Raw After Sept. 11 Resurfaces Now

snippet: In a newly released hour of commentary made in 2001 called “I Kinda Like It When a Lotta People Die,” the comedian delights in picturing the end of the world....
abstract: Jason Zinoman On Comedy column assesses George Carlin stand-up special I Kinda Like It When a Lotta People Die, which was recorded on Sept 10, 2001 and shelved as inappropriate due to terror attacks of following day; notes passage of time and changing cultural climate has made special's release possible.

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: I Kinda Like It When a Lotta People Die (Album)
